channel.title: Comments on: Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Pads
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: By: dishliquid
item.dc:creator: dishliquid
item.description: I'm a graphic and web designer who does work for AT Surgical. I have carpal tunnel syndrome from regularly using a mouse. My wrist has been flaring up more recently, but as soon as I put this brace it stopped hurting. I was surprised the wrist brace I was using wasn't super helpful, but this targets the whole nerve bundle and reduces discomfort.
item.content:encoded: I’m a graphic and web designer who does work for AT Surgical. I have carpal tunnel syndrome from regularly using a mouse. My wrist has been flaring up more recently, but as soon as I put this brace it stopped hurting. I was surprised the wrist brace I was using wasn’t super helpful, but this targets the whole nerve bundle and reduces discomfort.
